the part of the 
head (divided 
into five parts) 
palpable above the 
symphysis pubis.
Plot “O” in the cell 
that matches the 
time and the level 
of descent. Plot an 
“O” at every vaginal 
examination.
5/5, 4/5, 3/5, 2/5, 
1/5 and 0/5 should 
be used to describe 
the fetal station by 
abdominal palpation 
(9).
There are no reference 
thresholds for this 
observation, which will vary 
on each individual case.
 During first stage, 
assess descent 
every 4 hours before 
performing vaginal 
exam
